head.title: LateRooms.com - discounted hotel accomodation offering last minute bargains

meta.name: description
meta.content: Late availability hotel rooms at budget prices in the UK and USA. The cheapest way to find a bed for a weekend break or business trip reservation.

tr.td:
SEARCH RESULTS: BEST DEALS
You can refine your search below (or click here to do a new search)

td.span: Hint: Select a region to narrow down your search

tr.td: THE NEWTON HOTEL & HIGHLAND CONFERENCE CENTRE
COMFORT INN NOTTING HILL - ( TRENDY NOTTING HILL )

Prices in £ Pounds Sterling (UK)/Punts (Irish Republic). Ratings (these ratings do not relate to any particular association, and are only a guide to the facilities): *=Stars, L=lodge, D=Diamonds, NC=Non Classified
LateRooms rates are indicated in orange. All prices are inclusive of all relevant local taxes. Rates shown are per room per night to sleep the number of people indicated. Sleeps 2+1 and 2+2 implies 2 adults plus 1 or 2 children (aged under 14/16 - check hotel for details).

td.p:
Information which you supply whilst using this website may be held in our computer records.
It may be used to offer you new services (by post, telephone, e-mail or fax) which we think might be of interest to you.
If you do not want your information to be used for marketing purposes please inform us in writing at: LateRooms.com, 247 Chapel St, Manchester, M3 5EP, UK; or by email at remove@laterooms.com.
